enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Reserved for Sophomores, Juniors, and Seniors from every undergraduate school only.
title: SoC COMM_ST 390-0-1 Children's Culture

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: In this course, we will read and discuss research into the influences of media on child development. We will read research into the effects of using various kinds of media (e.g., television, video games, computers) on social, emotional, cognitive, and health development. This course will give you a broad understanding of the research on children and media by covering a range of topics

subject: COMM_ST
